prompt: Create a travel guide for a popular tourist destination.
expected_answer: An informative guide highlighting the top attractions, accommodations, and activities in a popular tourist spot.
ai_answer:
Title: Ultimate Travel Guide to Paris, the City of Lights

Introduction: Welcome, dear travellers! Prepare to embark on an enchanting journey through one of Europe's most iconic cities - Paris! Famous as a global hub for culture and romance, this city truly lives up to its reputation. This guide will help you navigate the beautiful streets and sites of Paris so that your visit is both memorable and hassle-free.

Getting there: Airports
Paris has two major airports - Charles de Gaulle (CDG) and Orly Airport (ORY). CDG is located about 20 kilometers northeast from the city center, while ORY lies only 15 km south of Paris. From both airports, you can easily reach the heart of Paris by train or shuttle services such as RER B for CDG and Orlyval shuttles for ORY.

Getting around: Public transportation
Paris boasts a world-renowned public transportation system consisting of buses, trams, and metro lines that connect every corner of the city. The most convenient way to travel is by purchasing a Navigo or carnet ticket for multiple journee
